summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Portable Travel Bottles Set, 3oz Silicone Travel Size Toiletries Containers, Leakproof, Foldable, Squeezable, Refillable, TSA Carry On for Shampoo Lotion Soap cosmetic (Pack of 2) Review Date: 2019/12/28 Store: INNERNEED Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Brand': 'INNERNEED', 'Capacity': '3 Ounces', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Travel', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.7 x 1.2 inches; 3.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I ordered the 'Portable Travel Bottles Set, 3oz Leakproof Foldable Squeezable Silicone Travel Size Toiletries Containers, TSA Carry On for Shampoo Lotion Soap (Pack of 2)' for review. My daughter has her favorite hair products that she has to pack when we travel and it's never fun packing those large bottles and other travel containers are just to small and or hard to fill. This set is so nice with the wide mouth openings which make them easy to fill and as you use the product, up they collapse to take up less space plus make it much easier to get every last drop of that precious product out haha. We have tried other compact TSA approved toiletry containers and I will say that these are so much more functional than the others, and most definitely of greater value. Review Title: Great for traveling with your favorite product. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen – Produces Longer, Healthier, Denser Lashes and Thicker Brows – Eyelash Serum – Boosts Skin Collagen – Drug-Free Formula - 1 fl oz. Review Date: 2020/01/15 Store: Veta Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Color': 'Silver, Black', 'Brand': 'Veta', 'Item Form': 'lotion', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.2 x 1.61 x 1.57 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '861121002645'} Review Text: I ordered this Veta – Lash and Eyebrow Serum – 2-in-1 Lash & Brow Pen for review. My teenage daughter was willing to try it out for me and these are her thoughts. "The pen application is not difficult. However, if you accidentally get it in your eyes it stings really badly. I had used it a couple of times before that happened. But, now I don't want to use it again."
Unfortunately she did not use it long enough to see if there was any lash growth. If my wife is brave enough to try it I will update my review. Review Title: Stings your eyes Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Review Date: 2020/01/27 Store: Tame the Beast Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Review Text: I ordered the 'Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz' for review.
I love to try different beard oils. This one is a medium weight oil that initially smells very lightly scented. It's a very "cologne" type scent which I really don't care for. I am more into the woodsy, tea tree, sandalwood type scents. At first smell, this beard oil had a very light scent however once applied, this scent lasts a very long time. This is where I had a hard time with it. I like to put my beard oil on in the morning and night after brushing my teeth and I was still able to smell this beard oil into the next morning, which might have been a good thing had I enjoyed the scent. The beard oil itself as I said earlier, is a medium weight, and has a decent hold and is actually a nice overall beard oil but I ended up giving it to my son, as I personally didn't like the scent at all. Review Title: Nice quality but the cologne scent is not my favorite. Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Boar Bristle Hair Brush with Nylon Pins for Thick Curly Long Wet Hair - Anti Static Brush Oval - Wooden Paddle Review Date: 2020/02/19 Store: Willkem accessories Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Willkem accessories', 'Shape': 'Oval', 'Handle Material': 'Wood', 'Special Feature': 'Ionic', 'Product Benefits': 'Detangle', 'Product Dimensions': '8.86 x 2.36 x 1.46 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Willkem'} Review Text: I ordered a ‘Boar Bristle Hair Brush with Nylon Pins for Thick Curly Long Wet Hair - Anti Static Brush Oval - Wooden Paddle’ for review. My wife has curly hair that can be difficult to tame. When this brush arrived, my younger daughter who has very long curly hair wanted to try it out. When she brushed through her hair, she felt it reduced the static and made her hair feel softer. So much so that my wife never got the chance to use as my daughter claimed it as hers. The brush handle is made with a thick, durable feeling wood. The bristles are much more durable and pull through the hair better than those with plastic or silicone bristles. Overall, this is a nicely made brush, that works well, and worth its price point. Review Title: Nicely made brush Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Native Deodorant - Natural Deodorant For Women and Men - 3 Pack - Aluminum Free, Free of Parabens and Sulfates - Vegan, Contains Probiotics - Linen & Cotton Flower, Peony & Jasmine Tea, Sweet Almond & Honey Review Date: 2020/03/03 Store: Native Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Native', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Scent': 'Jasmine', 'Number of Items': '3', 'Unit Count': '7.95 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '8.4 x 6.7 x 1.6 inches; 15.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '812154032857'} Review Text: I ordered 'Native Deodorant - Natural Deodorant - 3 Pack Seasonal' for review. this set comes with three different scents Each scent is light and not overpowering. The deodorant is soft and goes on smoothly. My wife, who has to use an extra strength deodorant has been pleased with the odor control. Her sensitive skin has no issues with this deodorant. Overall a great natural product.

I hope this review was helpful! Review Title: Works well to control odor Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Padgene Makeup Vanity Mirror with Lights,1x 2X 3X 5X 7X Magnification 360°Adjustable Rotation 4-Fold 34 LED Lighted Mirror with Touch Screen,Stand Height & Brightness Adjustable (White) Review Date: 2020/04/21 Store: Padgene Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '15.87 x 9.29 x 4.88 inches; 2.66 Pounds'} Review Text: I ordered the 'Padgene Makeup Vanity Mirror with Lights,1x 2X 3X 5X 7X Magnification 360°Adjustable Rotation 4-Fold 34 LED Lighted Mirror with Touch Screen,Stand Height & Brightness Adjustable (White)' for review. This mirror comes fully assembled and is quite simple to use. It has a touch button to turn on the light. It has multiple magnifications. The ability to fold it up so it takes less space is also beneficial making it easier to store or take up less space on your counter top. The mirrors are clear without scratches or flaws. The stand is plastic, so it may not be as durable as a mirror with a metal base or stand. The price point does seem a little high for the quality, but my wife really likes this mirror and uses it everyday. Overall, this is a well made mirror with great magnification.

I hope this review is helpful! Review Title: Works well Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties Hair Accessories Set For Girls and Women,Large Retractable Cotton,18 Colors 36 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/30 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Material': 'Cotton', 'Item Form': 'Elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 5.51 x 1.57 inches; 3.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582479'} Review Text: I ordered a set of 'Qiray 36 Pieces, 18 Colors Large Retractable Cotton Hair Ties Hair Bands, Suitable for All Hair Thickening Hairstyle' for review. Both my daughters and wife have longer hair and go through a multitude of hair ties. These are reasonably priced and are well made for hair ties. My daughter told me these are her favorite hair ties. They do not get caught up in her curls, nor do they get tangled when they are removed. They have good stretch and hold her thick hair well. These are nice and wide. Overall, these are a good economical option for hair ties. Review Title: Work well in my daughter's thick and curly hair. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Summary of Preferences and Patterns:**

1. **Travel Coordination**: Strong preference for functional, travel-friendly products that optimize space and ease of use (e.g., travel bottles).

2. **Beauty and Personal Care**: An inclination toward beauty products, especially those targeting hair and skin, with multiple purchases in this category (e.g., lash and brow serum, beard oil, hair brush).

3. **Family-Centric Purchases**: Frequent purchases cater to family needs, particularly for daughters and a spouse, indicating a focus on family convenience and satisfaction (e.g., hair accessories, deodorants).

4. **Quality Over Fragrance**: Disappointment in products with undesirable scents, illustrating a preference for quality and usability over strong fragrances (e.g., beard oil scent issue).

5. **Health-Conscious Choices**: Attention to natural and vegan products, particularly in deodorants and other personal care items, highlights a preference for health-conscious and environmentally friendly options.

6. **Durability and Functionality**: Preference for well-made products that provide long-lasting functionality, evident in positive reviews of hair tools and personal care items.

7. **User Experience Focus**: Strong emphasis on ease of use, with positive feedback on products that enhance usability during daily routines (e.g., makeup mirror, effective brushes).

Overall, this individual's shopping behavior reflects a balance between quality, functionality, and family-centered choices, alongside a commitment to healthier, natural product options.

target_interaction.title: The bedazzled was too big and bulky on the nails
target_interaction.text: I ordered a set of MUSE & Co Dazzling Collection 36 Stick-On Gel Nails Medium Length, French Sparkle for review.  Having preteen and a teenager in the house who love all things beauty, I felt they may like these.  The set has both plain and bedazzled nails.  The being was just to big and stuck up too far, often catching on clothes.  The had pretty good adhesion for a day or two then began coming up.  Overall nothing special, but the did work temporarily.
target_interaction.title_meta: MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs
features: 【What You Get】You will get 36pcs of Pre-adhesive Stick On Press nails in 12 different sizes (Total 36 Nail Tips). It comes with a total of 1 sets of the cleansing pad, wood stick and mini buffer.

【Convenient & User-friendly】Our Stick On Press Nails are so convenient that you can bring them anywhere and apply them within 5 minutes! Last minutes event or function to go to, having these will definitely save your nails ;)

【Easy Application & Removal】Super easy application that is also completely foolproof. Simply find your nail size, peel off the protective film at the back of the nail and stick it on! That's all you need to do to achieve pretty nails. Remove the nails by using nail polish remover and the wood stick provided.
【Natural Looking】Extremely thin and soft cuticles allow for a seamless, natural look that looks just like a salon manicure. Additionally, it feels so comfortable that you won't feel a thing!
【Suitable for Most Nails】Each set comes in 12 different sizes to ensure fit for most nail shapes and types. Have some extra Nail tips? Share it with your friends if you have different nail sizes!

videos.title: How to Apply MUSE & Co Stick On Nails
